summary: Implements the client‑side interface for the Windows Security Account Manager Remote (SAMR) DCE/RPC protocol, defining data structures, constants, and helper routines to connect to a SAM server and perform operations such as enumerating domains, users, groups, aliases, retrieving and setting account information, and managing passwords.
business_intent: Enable security tools and penetration‑testing scripts to query and manipulate Windows account databases remotely, facilitating discovery of user and group objects, credential extraction, and privilege escalation activities.
